show.subtitle: Charlene Spretnak and her guests track the progress of the “Big Make-over,” the cultural and political Relational Shift that is occurring in all fields as a result of recent discoveries that life is far more dynamically interrelated than modern societies have realized.
show.title: All Together Now

title: Meanings of Chanukah
content: Meanings of Chanukah — a talk with Rabbi Michael Lerner, editor of Tikkun magazine (now in its 26th year! <!--more--> and author of “How to Do Chanukah 2012″ and 11 books, including most recently Embracing Israel/Palestine; he is also the Executive Director of the Network of Spiritual Progressives; tikkun.org; poem by Louise Gluck
